messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I want to return a luggage set I bought and get the exact same one but in red color. Also, I want to return my skateboard and get a new one with a length of 34 inches and a custom design. Lastly, I want to return a pair of hiking boots. Can you help me with these returns and exchanges?

message.content: Hi, I want to return a luggage set I bought and get the exact same one but in red color. Also, I want to return my skateboard and get a new one with a length of 34 inches and a custom design. Lastly, I want to return a pair of hiking boots. Can you help me with these returns and exchanges?
